Package adept.serialization

Provides interfaces and classes for ADEPT data (de)serialization in XML, JSON and Binary format

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBinarySerializer
    Abstract superclass for serializers that serialize from and to a compressed binary-type format.
    AbstractSerializer
    Abstract superclass for serializers.
    AbstractStringSerializer
    Abstract superclass for serializers that serialize from and to a string-type format.
    JSONBinarySerializer
    Performs compressed binary serialization and deserialization, where the binary is based on an JSON string as returned from AbstractStringSerializer.serializeToString(Object).
    JSONStringSerializer
    Performs JSON string serialization and deserialization using the XStream library.
    XMLStringSerializer
    Performs XML string serialization and deserialization using the XStream library.
    XmlToAnnotation
    The Class XmlToAnnotation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SerializationType  

Package adept.serialization Description

Provides interfaces and classes for ADEPT data (de)serialization in XML, JSON and Binary format
